page.title: 12YVONNE'S DAY IN AMBERLEY
page.content: A typical day would be to get up at 7.30, wash, dress and have breakfast - Weetabix and milk. At 8.25 I go to school by car with my friend Claire and my sister Christine. When we arrive I play skipping with my friends. When the bell goes, we go inside and Mrs Mann takes the register. We go into the hall for assembly. After Assembly we do Maths and English. At playtime we have milk and go outside. Before lunch we have a story. Before we eat we go out to play. In the afternoon we do swimming and craft. At hometime, we put our chairs on the tables and say a prayer. My Dad collects me. At home I watch televeision until tea. After my bath I watch television again until 9.00 when I go to bed.
